item.title: Creating My Digital Garden
item.description: 7/29/23 I’ve always wanted to have a personal website. Never really knew what its purpose would be but I’ve always wanted to have one.

item.title: Digital Cities
item.description: Growing up, I had an idea for a website. Initially there would be one starting point (node), or maybe a couple based on region/language.

item.title: Humble Beginnings
item.description: 08/03/21 It took me a few days, but I finally got things together. I was stumped for a little while, trying to figure out why the CSS for my page wasn’t rendering.

item.title: Structuring the Garden
item.description: Some of my first thoughts on how I want this to look: I really like the Map of Content from https://www.
